meta.content: Penn Hills School District serves K-12th grade students and is located in Pittsburgh, PA.

ENTIRE high school choral, orchestra, and band student musicians

div.strong: Despite the mandated school closure, WE continue to ACTIVELY enroll new and returning students:

div.div: PreK Counts for ages 3-4 (724)437-2590 facilitated by the Private Industry Council
sconte@phsd.k12.pa.us - (412)793-7000, ext 7113
vhawke@phsd.k12.pa.us - (412)793-7000, ext 6124
dbonne@phsd.k12.pa.us - (412)793-7000, ext 5284

*Families with multiple students at varying grade levels need to make only contact with one (1) of the PHSD representatives above, and NO actual on site visit is required during the mandated school closure. Our registration staff will do their best to assist families with enrollment requirements via the use of available technology.

I just wanted to take the opportunity to reach out and to remind Everyone that Penn Hills School District remains active in its essential operations, and District staff remain on standby to assist students, families, and employees as needed...
Due to the Election Date change, April 28th is now an instructional day for all students and staff. June 2nd will be a Professional Day for staff, no school for students.
Please read for more information...

The Penn Hills School District is aware of the latest update from Governor Wolf, whereby schools will remain closed through the end of the current school year, with no extension of 19/20 school calendars expected...
Please read for more information...
As of today, I am happy to report that our...

h3.a: March 30th Public Board Meeting - Clarification & Reassurance

div.div: Our Monday, March 30, 2020 public voting session will be hosted, as scheduled, at Linton MS, beginning at 6:00 pm...
Thank you to more than 150 teachers and staff members who submitted a photo message for the PHSD students. This is sure to boost everyone's spirits!

h3.a: "Western Pa. teachers posting motivational, inspirational selfies for students"

div.div: As we close out the first week of the mandated school closure, I would like our Penn Hills families and staff to know...
Our Finance committee meeting will continue as planned at 6:00 PM on Monday, March 23, 2020 followed by our HR/Policy committee meeting...
All after-school activities as of Friday, March 13, 2020 have been cancelled . . . .
We are thrilled to be able to notify our Penn Hills families that we were just approved in Harrisburg to begin offering a single food distribution site at Linton MS as of TODAY from 12:00-2:00 pm...
Our Safety/Buildings and Grounds committee meeting will continue as planned at 6:00 PM this evening followed by our Curriculum committee meeting...
I just finished the webinar that was hosted by various State-level officials regarding the current status of Coronavirus in PA...

h3.a: The Saturday, March 14 SAT has been cancelled at Penn Hills Sr. High School

div.div: The March 14 SAT has been cancelled at Penn Hills Sr. High School.

h3.a: Penn Hills School District Coronavirus Preparedness

div.div: Our District Principals will be working with instructional teams to develop standards-based, K-12 lessons that may be forwarded to families via email, in the event our District would be advised to close at some point by the CDC and/or Allegheny Health Department...

NOW ENROLLING FOR THE 2020/2021 SCHOOL YEAR AT PENN HILLS HIGH SCHOOL
Call today for an application!
724-437-2590
